LanguageData.CookGrillcheese.label: cook two grilled cheeses
LanguageData.CookGrillcheese.description:
Two slices of bread grilled with cheese melt in the middle. 

Makes 2 servings. 

Food Effects: Metabolism.
LanguageData.GrillPolenta.label: grill two polenta
LanguageData.GrillPolenta.description:
Grilled slices of Polenta. 

Makes 2 servings. 

Food Effects: Metabolism and Manipulation.
LanguageData.Cookgrilledsandwich.label: cook two cheeseburgers
LanguageData.Cookgrilledsandwich.description:
A sandwich made of bread, meat, and cheese. 

Makes 2 servings. 

Food Effects: Metabolism.
LanguageData.CookTacos.label: cook five tacos
LanguageData.CookTacos.description:
Meat and Cheese in a corn shell. Requires meat, cheese, and cornmeal to make. 

 Makes 5 servings. 

Food Effects: Manipulation and Metabolism.
LanguageData.CookPorridge.label: cook two porridges
LanguageData.CookPorridge.description:
A simple porridge cooked from grains. 

Makes 2 servings. 

Food Effects: Sight and Blood Filtration.
